be.woutdev.economy.api.transaction

Interface TransactionFuture


  • public interface TransactionFuture
    The direct result of a Transaction being applied Transactions are asynchronous, this class represents the state of the processing of the Transaction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(java.util.function.Consumer<Transaction> consumer)
      Add a consumer that will be executed once the Transaction is cancelled or processed
      boolean cancel()
      Cancel the Transaction if it hasn't been processed yet
      TransactionResult getResult()
      Get the TransactionResult-object linked to the Transaction
      Transaction getTransaction()
      Get the Transaction-object linked to this TransactionFuture
      boolean isCancelled()
      Check if the Transaction is cancelled
      boolean isDone()
      Check if the Transaction has been processed Please note that this will return true if the transaction failed as well!
      boolean isSuccess()
      Check if the Transaction has been processed and succeeded

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        boolean cancel()
        Cancel the Transaction if it hasn't been processed yet
        Returns:
        If the cancellation of the Transaction was successful

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Check if the Transaction is cancelled
        Returns:
        If the Transaction is cancelled

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Check if the Transaction has been processed Please note that this will return true if the transaction failed as well!
        Returns:
        If the Transaction has been processed

      • isSuccess

        boolean isSuccess()
        Check if the Transaction has been processed and succeeded
        Returns:
        If the Transaction was successful

      • getTransaction

        Transaction getTransaction()
        Get the Transaction-object linked to this TransactionFuture
        Returns:
        The Transaction-object

        Get the TransactionResult-object linked to the Transaction
        Returns:
